generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide street with white lane markings and a visible Mercedes-Benz emblem on the hood, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are standing on a paved area next to the road, separated by a curb, which is a sidewalk.
- building: There are multiple buildings visible in the background and on the sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the sidewalk and in front of the buildings.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing bright and clear.
- person: Several individuals are standing on the sidewalk, some in groups, and one person is walking across the street.
- car: Multiple cars are visible, including a black sedan in the middle of the road and another black sedan on the right side of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible at the intersection, hanging from a pole.
- traffic sign: A red circular "No Entry" sign is visible on a pole near the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs.
- fence: A fence is visible on the right side of the image, near the building.
